title: Bruce Haack - 10 albums + artwork
description:
Bruce Haack - 10 albums + artwork

Bruce Clinton Haack (1931-1988) was a pioneer within the realm of electronic music. 
His albums for children is trippy and totally avant garde. The album Electric Lucifer is one of my all-time favorite albums with a psych touch with electronic equipment.

Albums included in this torrent:

The way out record for children - 1968
Electronic record for children - 1969
Electric Lucifer - 1970
Together - 1971
Captain entropy - 1973
The witch&#039;s vacation - 1974
Ebenezer Electric - 1976
Electric lucifer (book 2) - 1978
Haackula (unreleased) - 1978
Hush little robot - (Newly released compilation)

I also include some artwork that I have found. Very low-res unfortunately. If someone happens to have the originals on LP och som high-rez scans I would really appreciate if you write a comment so I can have them. A high-res scan of the Electric Lucifer front cover is high priority. :)
